label: Online Auctions
description: Online marketplaces for buying and selling various items through auctions.
intents: Find deals on items through auctions

subcategories.label: General Auctions
subcategories.description: Online auction sites that sell a wide variety of items.

subcategories.label: Electronics Auctions
subcategories.description: Online auction sites that specialize in selling electronics.

subcategories.label: Fashion Auctions
subcategories.description: Online auction sites that specialize in selling clothing and accessories.

subcategories.label: Home and Garden Auctions
subcategories.description: Online auction sites that specialize in selling home and garden items.

subcategories.label: Wholesale Auctions
subcategories.description: Online auction sites that specialize in selling items in bulk.
